sentences.en: A remarkable sight with racing fascia across its cool blue body.
sentences.cn: 看不到显着的赛车筋膜横扫其极酷的蓝色机构.

sentences.en: Arrows point to the anterior rectus sheath, peritoneum, and fascia transversalis.
sentences.cn: 箭头指向腹直肌鞘前层 、 腹膜和腹横筋膜.

sentences.en: Both problems can be solved by escharotomy of the burned skin down to the deep fascia.
sentences.cn: 上述两个问题都可用切开焦痂直至深筋膜来解决.
将仪表板安装在保险杆组合上.

sentences.en: Install plastic rivets to hold bottom of rear fascia to bumper reinforcement.
sentences.cn: 将固定后面板在保险杆加强组件的塑胶铆钉安装好.

sentences.en: Install push - in fastener holding center of fascia to rear closure panel.
sentences.cn: 安装中心面板紧固到后罩盘上的推进式固定件.

sentences.en: Install push - in fasteners holding fascia to quarter panel at wheelwell opening.
sentences.cn: 安装将面板紧固到车轮井开口的四分之一扇形盘上的推进式固定件.

sentences.en: Install push - in fasteners holding trunk lid slam bumpers to top of fascia.
sentences.cn: 安装将行李厢盖沿保险杆紧固到面板顶部上的推进式固定件.

sentences.en: It pierces the popliteal fascia , and lack to the popliteal veins ( 42.86 % ) .
sentences.cn: 小隐静脉以单支注入腘静脉占 42.86+9.35%.

sentences.en: No logo or special designs are to be attached the fascia.
sentences.cn: 参展商不得在摊位招牌上张贴商标或更改招牌设计.

sentences.en: No logo or special designs are to be attached to the fascia.
sentences.cn: 招牌上不允许有商标或者特殊的设计。

sentences.en: Objective To study morphology in the application of transplanting tensor fascia lata.
sentences.cn: 目的为临床应用阔筋膜张肌带蒂肌皮瓣移植提供形态学基础.

sentences.en: The lower fascia splitter is punctuated by two fairings.
sentences.cn: 较低的筋膜分离器是由两个整流罩打断.

sentences.en: This magnificent work of engineering prowess sports a Martini racing fascia.
sentences.cn: 这一宏伟工程的工作能力体育1马提尼赛车筋膜.

sentences.en: This scarlet red gem stands out with racing fascia.
sentences.cn: 这猩红宝石随时与赛车筋膜.

trans.tran_cn: 带，<医>绷带，（店门上的）招牌，<解>筋膜
